Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand are currently unbeaten, having defeated England in the tournament opener and then clinching victory against Netherlands to make it back-to-back.
Miscellaneous Highlights: In ODI World Cup history, New Zealand have faced Bangladesh in five matches and have clinched victory in all of those matches.
Others: New Zealand broke Bangladesh's long standing home winning streak in ODIs last month, when they clinched a 2-0 series win in Dhaka
